Text:
Hi there...is the audio in sync on this version? I downloaded the other version this morning...looks like your name only with and added "e" at the end...MATINE. 
I figured out a way to fix that using media player classic (and vlc player) but I would like to burn this to dvd so that my family can enjoy. I haven't found a viable solution for that.
Out of sync. But easily fixed with VLC. Hope another copy comes out soon!
